attributes.additional_details: Well, I couldn't do any worse. I dont know much about football, but as long as their kicking toward the right end I think we will be alright. I think i can also help them design and customize their outfits better. So make me manager. Im writing to Jim'll Fix It as well, so its only a matter of time anyway.

rejection.details: The apointment of the next England manager is a matter for the FA.
